title: What We're Missing in the Uvalde Story | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Ken Paxton | 5/25/22
description:
A horrific attack happened in Uvalde, Texas, and Democrats were quick to make it political. But Glenn discusses the root of the issue and relates the problem to everything else going wrong in America. Glenn goes over the depersoning that occurred with the politicization of COVID and warns of that happening with gun control. Glenn discusses the first school shooting and the deadliest school attack in history that can help give perspective on the massacre in Texas. Glenn and Stu discuss Ricky Gervais' latest comedy special and Dave Chappelle surviving on Netflix. BlazeTV host Jason Whitlock talks with Glenn about the Uvalde atrocity and the God-shaped hole in America. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton gives insight on the Uvalde attack.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
